Posts.Content: Aug 19, 2012 07:26PM muffie64 wrote: Caryn, I have my biopsy on Tuesday morning.. so your title caught my eye.  I am a wreck also... scared.  My Birad was a 4 also.  I have a microcalcification cluster in my left breast.  I guess the good thing is I have mammograms every year so this is the first time I have had to go through this and if it is anything, hopefully it is caught early.  Good luck tomorrow... I will be thinking about you!  I am having the Stereotactic biopsy are you?
Posts.Title: Biopsy Tomorrow and I'm a Wreck LeahLeah LeahLeah
